fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a player at night to lull them to sleep and steal their possessions.
- Use the ability you stole the previous night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- During the phase after you target a player, you will be able to use the day and/or night abilities of their role. You will be notified what they are when you hypnotize them. Any drawbacks relating to causing harm to Town members will not apply to you.
- Your target will be notified that they were lulled to sleep on the night you hypnotize them. The following night, they will be unable to use their night ability.
- You have a Basic autovest that protects you the first time you are attacked.
